sections.title: What type of business do you want to register?

fields.label: What type of business do you want to register?

sections.title: What is your role in the business?
You cannot register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.label: cannotReg
fields.infoText:
This is because the business has not authorised you to register it for Fuel Duty.

You'll need to sign out, or save your progress and come back when you have been authorised.

sections.title: Your guarantor must send their details to HMRC

fields.infoText:
To register for Fuel Duty you must complete and submit this form. 

Your guarantor must also complete the VAT: deferment schedule - Simplified Import VAT Accounting reduced security (SIVA2) form (opens in a new window). They must then send it to HMRC.
You must have a guarantor to complete this form and register for Fuel Duty.

fields.label: Trading name (optional)
fields.helpText: Enter the trading name if different from the business name

sections.title: Enter the business' Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number

fields.label: Enter the business' Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number
fields.helpText: This is 2 letters and then 15 numbers. The 2 letters must be the country code. For example 'GB'

fields.label: Find an EORI country code
fields.infoText:
Code and Country:

**United Kingdom - GB**

Austria - AT

Belgium - BE

sections.title: Enter business address and contact details

fields.infoText: We will only use these details if we need to discuss this form with the business unless you provide another correspondence details.

fields.label: Is the correspondence address different to the address provided above?

fields.infoText: We will use these details if we need to contact the business to discuss this form.

fields.label: contDet
fields.infoText: We will use these details to contact you if we need to discuss this form.

declarationSection.title: Submit form to register the business for Fuel Duty

fields.infoText: By submitting this form you are confirming that all the information youâ€™ve provided is correct and complete.
This is your last opportunity to print or save a PDF copy of your submitted registration.
Your guarantor must also complete the VAT: deferment schedule - Simplified Import VAT Accounting reduced security (SIVA2) form (opens in a new window). They must then send it to HMRC.

##If you need a guarantor
You must complete the Guarantee deferment of payment to HMRC (C1201) form and send it to HMRC.


##If you need a bank guarantee for oils
You must complete the Guarantee for payment of sums due to the Commissioners of HMRC (C1201HO) form and send it to HMRC.

##If you do need to set up a direct debit mandate
You must complete a Duty deferment instructions to pay by Direct Debit (C1202) form and send it to HMRC.

##If you do not need a guarantor
You must complete the SIVA2 form and send an EPSS letter to HMRC.
